name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra AI Smartphone, 12GB Memory, 256GB Storage, S Pen Included, Titanium Black and Galaxy Watch Ultra Orange, 47mm, LTE (UK Version)
features: Design: Galaxy S25 Ultra's rounded design expresses a unified identity for the Galaxy S Series, With it's sleek & strong titanium frame & a built-in S Pen, it's an ultra-modern, vision of bold design ⁶
Camera: Our next-gen ProVisual Engine is now boosted by our powerful processor, allowing you to capture, view and edit for our best camera and editing experience yet ⁷ ⁸

Performance & Battery: The most powerful processor for Galaxy offers improved real-time ray tracing & Vulkan optimisation for ultra-smooth, immersive gameplay, Thanks to our mDNIe technology, battery usage time is enhanced for you to enjoy ⁹ ¹⁰ ¹¹
Titanium Design: Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra is made with a durable lightweight casing ready for any tough environment.
Water resistant: 10 ATM water resistance - Take the plunge into the water with the watch ready for swimming, water skiing and more.
